ovdesc.p: This application enables a passbook to be updated, with outstanding entries, without requiring a transaction to be processed.
It is a type 'W' application, consequently the passbook is updated when the Verify function is used.

desc.p: This field reserved for future use.
A multi-value list of accounts whose passbooks require updating.
A list of accounts or, more likely an account number, should be entered here in Verify mode.
See Passbook Processing in the Module description for Retail Bank for a complete desciption of passbook updating.
16 Account id (i It must be a valid passbook account.
The key to this file is simply an identifier and bears no significance to the processing. It is recommended that the TELLER.ID or user name is used.
This field reserved for future use.
